title: Xin Zhao
body:
Please nerf Xin Zhao with devourer because it is to broken and he have too much attackspeed !!!

Dark4Killer

replies.body:
German Board talk about Bratwurst Sauerkraaaaut and Lederhosen please or I call Rito! 


You never experienced the release Xin don't you? Be happy this is NOT the release Xin!
xin is brken as fck with devorour blade tanky stuff and new hydra ...
xin dont needs a nerf devourer needs a nerf
